mapper.select: SELECT SizeID, SizeCN, SizeEN, InUser, DATE_FORMAT(InDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS InDate, LastEditUser, DATE_FORMAT(LastEditDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS LastEditDate FROM SizeMapping ORDER BY InDate DESC LIMIT #{arg0,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{arg1,jdbcType=INTEGER};

SELECT A.SizeID, B.SizeCN, B.SizeEN, B.InUser, DATE_FORMAT(B.InDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS InDate, B.LastEditUser, DATE_FORMAT(B.LastEditDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS LastEditDate FROM ( SELECT DISTINCT SizeID FROM Item WHERE ItemGroupID = (SELECT ItemGroupID FROM Item WHERE ItemID = #{itemID,jdbcType=INTEGER}) ) A INNER JOIN SizeMapping B ON A.SizeID = B.SizeID;
SELECT SizeID, SizeCN, SizeEN, InUser, InDate, LastEditUser, LastEditDate FROM SizeMapping WHERE SizeID = #{sizeID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT SizeID, SizeCN, SizeEN, InUser, InDate, LastEditUser, LastEditDate FROM SizeMapping WHERE (SizeCN = #{sizeName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} OR BINARY SizeEN = #{sizeName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO SizeMapping ( SizeCN, SizeEN, InUser, LastEditUser ) VALUES ( #{sizeCN, jdbcType=NVARCHAR}, #{sizeEN, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{lastEditUser, jdbcType=VARCHAR} )
